contents:
BBC的報導
Mr Putin has asked the PM to move to the post of deputy head of the National Security Council, reports say.


報告中說Putin請求首相就任國家安全保障理事會的副議長。
The announcement came as a surprise, and in a statement Mr Putin thanked the government for what it had achieved.

這個發表令人驚訝，Putin在一個聲明中感謝了政府的工作。
BBC Moscow correspondent Sarah Rainsford said the reason why Mr Putin had removed Mr Medvedev was unclear.

BBC在莫斯科的特派員Sarah Rainsford說Putin解任Medvedev的原因尚不明確。
